chunks.zh: 16e 是什么电子辣鸡？
chunks.en: What electronic trash is 16e?

chunks.zh: 800nit 的 60hz 低屏调光、单摄像头、砍了 magsafe 、没有超宽频、uwb 都能砍(airtag 不能用)、A18 还是残血再砍一刀、拿 C1 芯片上来测试用(还不用交高通税)，拿 4 5 年前的设备(iphone11 12)比，2025 年了能出这种产品，还卖 4499 ，不知道苹果怎么想的。真 only apple can do.
chunks.en: 800nit 60hz low screen dimming, single camera, magsafe removed, no ultra-wideband, even uwb is removed (airtag cannot be used), A18 is still further cut down, using the C1 chip for testing (and no Qualcomm tax), comparing with devices from 4-5 years ago (iphone11 12), to release such a product in 2025, selling for 4499, I don't know what Apple is thinking. Truly only Apple can do.

chunks.zh: 果粉的福报
chunks.en: The blessing of Apple fans

chunks.zh: 我觉得这次非常的厉害，从命名到定价，还有策略，都很强，比之前脑子好用多了，第一，这台机器算 16 系列，那么对于一些人来说，他买新不买旧，买的是什么，是 16 ，虽然是 16E ，但是也是 16 系列，满足攀比心理，很多人不买 mini ，基本上都喜欢大。第二，这次定价给经销商很大的空间，并且跟了国补政策，从风险性上来说，是非常好的
chunks.en: I think this time is very impressive, from the naming to the pricing, and the strategy, are very strong, much smarter than before. First, this machine is considered a 16 series, so for some people, they buy new and not old, what they are buying is 16, although it is 16E, it is also a 16 series, satisfying the comparison mentality, many people don't buy mini, basically they all like big. Second, this pricing gives distributors a lot of room, and follows the national subsidy policy, from a risk perspective, it is very good.

chunks.zh: @bk201 那请先退出 WTO
chunks.en: @bk201 Then please withdraw from the WTO first

chunks.zh: 我们苹果也要有自己的 Nova11🤣
chunks.en: We Apple should also have our own Nova11🤣

chunks.zh: @gogozs 为啥不好的要给父母？
chunks.en: @gogozs Why give the bad ones to parents?

chunks.zh: 苹果公众号还特意标注参加国补，实际售价 3999😂
chunks.en: Apple's official account specifically marked participating in national subsidies, with an actual selling price of 3999😂

chunks.zh: @laikick #8 引用不说来源？
chunks.en: @laikick #8 Quoting without mentioning the source?

chunks.zh: 信号好了 C1 信号牛 B ，信号差了华为基站垃圾
chunks.en: Good signal, C1 signal is awesome. Bad signal, Huawei base station is trash.

chunks.zh: @laikick #8 “这是好事啊“，符合头像
chunks.en: @laikick #8 'This is a good thing', matches the avatar

chunks.zh: @bk201 川普经济学😂
chunks.en: @bk201 Trump economics😂

chunks.zh: op 讲的高通税跑不掉的,专利授权
chunks.en: The Qualcomm tax that OP mentioned cannot be avoided, it's a patent licensing fee.

chunks.zh: 好骂爱听
chunks.en: I love to hear the scolding

chunks.zh: 2 年后有锁 899
chunks.en: Locked for 899 in 2 years

chunks.zh: 非常好，SE1-3 那些更废物的东西都能卖出去，SE4 更不缺市场，8G 内存还有快门键哦 😂
chunks.en: Very good, those more useless things like SE1-3 can be sold, SE4 doesn't lack a market even more, 8G of memory and there's a shutter button 😂

chunks.zh: 16e 虽然是垃圾，但存储可是金子。
chunks.en: Although 16e is trash, the storage is gold.

chunks.zh: @bk201 国补是“国家出台的消费补贴”，不是“国产补贴”。苹果每年给国内上那么多税，参加国补也正常
chunks.en: @bk201 National subsidy is a 'consumption subsidy introduced by the state', not a 'domestic subsidy'. Apple pays so much tax in China every year, it's normal to participate in national subsidies.

chunks.zh: @bk201 苹果在国家纳税可比国内企业多多了，更何况苹果不像华为等能拿巨额补贴。真想盘活国内消费，靠的从来不是你我那点芝麻谷子。真要靠红贵族及神秘富豪们愿意回国消费，这才是核心所在。
chunks.en: @bk201 Apple pays much more taxes in the country than domestic companies, not to mention that Apple can't get huge subsidies like Huawei. If you really want to revitalize domestic consumption, it's never been about our little sesame seeds. It really depends on whether the red aristocracy and mysterious rich people are willing to return to China for consumption, that's the core.

chunks.zh: @bk201 直接强制下架国外品牌不就得了
chunks.en: @bk201 Just force foreign brands to be removed from the shelves, wouldn't that be enough?

chunks.zh: @tunggt 我习惯了去 ebay 捡二手，两三年前$130 捡的 SE3 给我妈用挺不错。就是不知道这个机器改卡好不好改，如果不用动主板的那就没问题。争取$199 捡个帮老爸的 XR 也换下来。这种机器就适合买给老人家用，砍的东西都是老人家不需要的，非常好。买国产 Android 我真的不放心。
chunks.en: @tunggt I'm used to picking up used ones on eBay. I picked up an SE3 for $130 a couple of years ago for my mom, which is pretty good. I just don't know if it's easy to modify the SIM card on this machine. If I don't have to touch the motherboard, that's fine. I'll try to pick up an XR for $199 to replace my dad's too. This kind of machine is suitable for buying for the elderly, the things that are cut are not needed by the elderly, which is very good. I really don't trust buying domestic Android.

chunks.zh: @tunggt 想啥呢，消费当然靠“大众”富豪人人买私人飞机，都不如“大众”人手一个 1000 块红米
chunks.en: @tunggt What are you thinking? Consumption of course relies on the "masses". Billionaires buying private jets is not as good as the "masses" each having a 1000 yuan Redmi phone.
